modules.title: Find Your Voice
modules.intro:
Every great film begins with who you are.

 In this module, I’ll show you how to connect with your own story — what moves you, what shapes you, and what questions you need to ask to find your unique voice as a filmmaker.

modules.title: Build Your Theme
modules.intro:
Stories only matter when they hold truth.

I’ll teach you how to turn personal experiences into powerful themes that resonate with people — no matter where they are in the world.

modules.title: Create Your World
modules.intro:
Use what you have. Build what you know.

I’ll show you how to design the world of your story — choosing locations, spaces, and environments that feel real, accessible, and honest to the story you want to tell.

modules.title: Writing the Script
modules.intro:
Strong stories come from simple, honest places.

Learn how I build character, conflict, and structure — using real life, difficult questions, and emotional truth to create stories that stay with people long after the credits roll.

modules.title: Casting & Directing Performance
modules.intro:
The right actors will change your story.

I’ll show you how I cast for honesty, how I work with actors (both professionals and non-actors), and how I direct performances that feel raw, vulnerable, and unforgettable.

modules.title: Visual Storytelling & Production
modules.intro:
Let your camera serve the story.

Learn how I use cinematography, sound, light, and movement to build worlds that feel intimate, alive, and deeply human — even on a small budget.

modules.title: Monetizing & Distributing Your Film
modules.intro:
Your film is your product. Own it.

I’ll teach you how I build an audience for my films, how I think about distribution, and how to create a sustainable path as an independent filmmaker.
